questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) is considering how to manage its accounts for the B2B portion of its business. NTO uses person accounts for its B2C business, and business accounts with related contacts for its B2B business. NTO has several B2B customer accounts that are very large. These accounts have child accounts that represent departments and opportunities at the department level that will need to be visible to users at the parent account level. NTO has Customer Community Plus licenses.
How should NTO manage its accounts in its Partner Community?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Enable the External Account Hierarchy setting departments as child accounts.

Enabling the External Account Hierarchy allows NTO to establish a hierarchical relationship between parent accounts and child accounts, which is essential for managing large B2B customer accounts with departments and opportunities at the department level. This setting ensures that users at the parent account level have visibility into the child accounts and associated opportunities, aligning with NTO's business requirements.
Agree that the correct answer may be (D) if the question is related to B2B business accounts.

Not sure about this one but it seems to be talking about the B2B accounts which are business accounts. So they can use External Account Hierarchy for those as the person accounts are the B2C ones. So not sure about the answer here but somehow feels a bit wrong?

comments.content:
I agree that the question is missing context.

If the question is alluding to the child accounts being potentially person accounts, then External Account Hierarchy settings cannot be applied and A would be correct. "You can use an external account hierarchy only for business accounts, not person accounts." https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.exp_cloud_setup_ext_acc_hierarchy_settings.htm&type=5

Furthermore, if the person accounts are using account role optimization (ARO), then External Account Hierarchies cannot be used, supporting A even further. 

D would only be correct if ARO is NOT being used AND the child accounts are explicitly only B2B.

choices.C: Extend the Standard Role Hierarchy setting departments as child accounts.
choices.D: Enable the External Account Hierarchy setting departments as child accounts.
choices.A: Since NTO has person accounts, it cannot use the External Account Hierarchy and will need to use groups and sharing rules to grant the required record access.
choices.B: Use the Business Accounts and Contacts with Sharing Sets to grant additional record access as needed.

choices.C: Check whether the SEO Institute has provided the approval for the site with end date.
choices.D: Check whether manual sitemap refresh happens on the last day of every month.
choices.A: Check whether the Experience Cloud site is public and activated.
choices.B: Check whether a custom robots.txt file to control indexing has been created.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
A. Check whether the Experience Cloud site is public and activated.
B. Check whether a custom robots.txt file to control indexing has been created.

Ensuring that the Experience Cloud site is public and activated allows search engines to index its content. Additionally, creating a custom robots.txt file enables control over which parts of the site are indexed by search engines, optimizing visibility and search engine ranking.

Selected Answer: AB
'The robots.txt file for your site is automatically generated. It allows your entire site to be indexed. However, if you want to hide certain pages of your public site from search engines, you can create a custom robots.txt file.' https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.networks_seo_configure.htm&type=5

questions.question_text:
The mission of No More Homelessness (NMH) is to help advocate end homelessness using its Experience Cloud site. NMH’s site manager wants to set up search engine optimization (SEO) to ensure NMH’s public Experience Cloud site is visible to search engines.
Which two practices does the site manager need to do to ensure SEO is implemented successfully? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Changing the Salesforce CDN Impacts definitions of all Lightning Web Components used in public pages.
choices.D: Changing the Salesforce CDN overwrites LDS defaults.
choices.A: Changing the Salesforce CDN impacts the AppExchange packages in the org that use Documents object.
choices.C: Changing the Salesforce CDN affects SAML SSO settings for all custom URLs in that domain.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
'Changing the Salesforce CDN affects SAML Single Sign-On Settings for all custom URLs in that domain.' https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.community_builder_cdn_considerations.htm&type=5

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks (CK) uses SSO (Single Sign-On) for its customer portal. The customer portal is built on the Customer Service template which uses LDS (Lightning Design System) and has public pages that use Lightning Web Components. CK has also set up the Salesforce Content Delivery Network (CDN) for its domain, which CK is planning to change.
What is a potential impact of changing the Salesforce CDN?

choices.D: All New York City audience members
choices.C: Members that are part of both the New York City audience and the Legal Department audience
choices.A: New York City audience members with the Legal Department sharing set
choices.B: All Cloud Kicks Experience Cloud site members

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Members that are part of both the New York City audience and the Legal Department audience

The Rich Content Editor component will be visible to members who are part of both the New York City audience (because it's assigned to the New York City audience variation) and the Legal Department audience (because it's specifically assigned to this audience within the New York City variation).

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks (CK) is using audience targeting to display pages and components to certain users based on their assigned audience. The New York City account contains multiple departments, all of which belong to that account. One of the page variations of the Home page of CK’s Experience Cloud site is assigned to the New York City audience. CK also has a Rich Content Editor component within this Home page that is assigned only to the Legal Department audience.
Who will be able to see the Rich Content Editor component?

Universal Containers has implemented Chat, but agents are complaining that they have to capture several pieces of information before being able to service the customer.
What should an administrator do to capture information upfront on the Experience Cloud site?

choices.B: Create a pre-chat form to fill out before initiating Chat.
choices.A: Create a flow for customers to fill out before initiating Chat.
choices.C: Deploy a unique chat per topic.
choices.D: Enable Chat for only authenticated users and pass the user’s information on hidden fields.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B-. Create a pre-chat form to fill out before initiating Chat.

By creating a pre-chat form, customers can provide necessary information upfront before initiating the chat session. This allows agents to better understand the customer's needs and context before engaging in the conversation.
